snippet: Wednesday’s debate will provide ample opportunity for robust exchanges and a level of specificity that both sides have often sought to avoid.
abstract: Debate between Pres Obama and Mitt Romney will be divided into six segments of 15 minutes, with ample opportunity for robust exchanges and level of specificity that both sides have often sought to avoid; Romney and his aides continue to believe that presidential debates represent critical opportunity for him to change dynamics of contest.
